rules_text:
Choose two – 
• The next time a triggered ability of a permanent you control would trigger this turn, that ability triggers an additional time.
• Search your library for a creature card with mana value 2 or less, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
• Create a token that’s a copy of a creature you control.
• Sacrifice a creature. If you do, draw two cards.
notes:
!exportname Fahribs Command
